```{r}
source('https://inkaverse.com/setup.r')

# Importar datos
url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15r7ZwcZZHbEgltlF6gSFvCTFA-CFzVBWwg3mFlRyKPs/edit#gid=172957346"
gs <- url %>% as_sheets_id()
fb <- gs %>%
  range_read("fb")

# Convertir a data.frame asegur√°ndonos de eliminar atributos de tibble
fb <- as.data.frame(fb)

# Mostrar la estructura de los datos
str(fb)

```
```{r}
fb %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  dplyr::select(-c("block")) %>%
  pairs.panels(
    hist.col = "red",
    pch = 21,
    stars = TRUE,
    scale = FALSE,
    lm = TRUE
  )

```
```{r}
library(FactoMineR)

mv <- fb %>%
    group_by(riego, geno) %>%
    summarise(across(where(is.numeric), ~ mean(., na.rm = TRUE))) %>%
    PCA(scale.unit = T, quali.sup = c(1:4), graph = F)

p1 <- plot(mv, choix = "ind", habillage = "ind", label = "ind")

p2 <- plot(mv, choix = "var")

list(p1, p2) %>%
    plot_grid(plotlist = ., nrow = 1)
```
